Game.Name: Â¡Mucha Lucha!- Mascaritas of the Lost Code
Game.Plot: Mucha Lucha, the over-the-top comedy TV adventure series on the Kids WB, comes to the Game Boy Advance. Wrestle your was a Rikochet, Buena Girl and the Flea through this wacky adventure in the quest to recover the all-important Code of Masked Wrestling!
